title: Fireflies AI â€” AI Tool Review
description: Fireflies AI records, transcribes, and analyzes meetings with AI, then syncs insights to your CRM and project management tools. Fireflies AI is an AI meeting assistant that automatically records and transcribes calls across all major conferencing platforms. Its 'Fred' AI bot joins meetings autonomously and creates searchable transcripts, summaries, action items, and sentiment analysis. Strong CRM integrations (Salesforce, HubSpot) make it popular with sales and customer success teams. Highlights: CRM integration (Salesforce, HubSpot). AI sentiment analysis. Searchable meeting archive. Auto-join all major platforms. Topic tracking across meetings.
